title: Bored To Death [Soundtrack] - Season 1 (2010)
description:
This is the official HBO soundtrack for the first season of Bored To Death. Unfortunately soundtracks have not been released for season two or three as far as I know.

YEAR: 2010
BITRATE: ~ 200 MB/s
FORMAT: MP3
TRACKS: 15
DURATION: 54:43

Each track ends in a short few-second clip from the show itself, which brings back great memories.

Please seed and support the show where you can! A film is in production at the moment, so go see it when it is released :)
